-  SMPTETimeType.type30Drop 

Case# SMPTETimeType.type30Drop

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
case type30Drop
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreAudioTypes/SMPTETimeType/type30Drop#Discussion)

30 video frames per second, with video-frame numbers adjusted to ensure that the timecode matches elapsed clock time.
